attributes.action: Allow Leave voters misled by false promises to ask that their vote be discounted
attributes.additional_details: Evidence is in the interviews given by politicians over the last few days and on the BBC and other news websites.
attributes.background: Leave politicians have now either denied or described as a "mistake" their false claims that £350m UK currently sends to the EU could go to the NHS instead & that immigration levels would fall if the UK left. The mandate for Article 50 is now called into question and a new one should be sought.

rejection.details: Because voting is anonymous, it is not clear how you think the Government or Parliament could retrospectively change the outcome of the referendum.
